metadata.Title: CVE-2008-3931 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
javareconf in R 2.7.2 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via asymlink attack on temporary files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2008-3931` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

r-base - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
r-base-core - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
r-base-html - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
r-mathlib - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
r-recommended - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: r-base package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.4-1ubuntu1').
